name: Angel Garfias Portfolio
description:
Welcome to my portfolio app! I'm Angel Garfias, a passionate developer on a journey to create remarkable digital experiences. This app is a reflection of my dedication to the craft of software development. ðŸš€ 
As you explore this app, you'll discover a collection of my projects, each crafted with care and innovation. From web development to mobile apps, I've poured my heart and skills into these creations, aiming to solve real-world challenges and bring ideas to life. 
With a strong foundation in programming languages like Kotlin, C#, JavaScript, Python, and more, I've built projects that demonstrate my proficiency in creating interactive websites, intuitive user interfaces, efficient RT3D systems and Android apps
